channel.title: CombustionX Dev. Team [VPS|Paid Webhost|Domain][Webclient]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/sgtj48.png[/img]
[b]Welcome to the Dev. Team of CombustionX!
Link to Server- www.combustion-x.com/webclient.htm
This is a [PI] Source - Final Judgement.
Yes i realized this is over-used but I'm trying to make it something unique.
Original Server Features-
634 Models
Summoning Models/Npcs (Incomplete)
Ancient Curses
Chaotic/Primal Models
Barrows minigame
Castlewars (incomplete)
Pest Control (incomplete)
Fight Pits
Corporeal Beast
Lunar Spellbook
Ancient Spellbook
Modern Spellbook
Donator Chest
Slayer Point System
Server Point System
Re-integrated PkP System
::yell System
ClanChat
Skilling Zone (Incomplete)
Ingame Hiscores
Crystal Key Chest
Frost Dragons
Donator Zone W/ Gambling Options
Warriors' Guild W/ Dragon Defender
Some Features I Personally Added Into The Server-
Added a Bal'lak the Pummeller as a custom Dungeoneering Boss for players.
Added Point values to basically every worthwhile item.
Moved the home from Edgeville to Falador.
Added all Extreme Potions + Recover Special.
Added custom Mystery boxes that open to reveal great items.
Added a point shop with various items.
Added a Vote4Points. -Love-
Added Customizable Yelltags.
Added a great Starter kit.
Added Vengeance against Npcs.
Added Elysian and Divine Effects.
- More Features to Come and be Added -
[u][b]Dev. Team Details-[/b][/u]
Source Coder ( 2 / 3 )
James Joe Open
Forum Coder ( 0 / 2 )
Open Open
Server Helpers(Player Assistants) ( 0 / 3 )
Open Open Open
GFX Designer/Artist ( 0 / 2 )
Open Open
Website Designers ( 0 / 2 )
Open Open[/b]
[code=html]Application Form-
Name
Age
Applying for
Experience in that specified field
Supporting proof
How active will you be during the development?
Why do you want this job?
Your msn[/code]
[b]Server Statistics-
The server is hosted on a monthly VPS with 1 Dedi Ip Address.
I have a paid Webhost and a Domain name.[/b]
Pictures will be coming soon!
Contact Details -
[b]My Msn - Kkjameskk@Hotmail.com[/b]
I am usually on Msn so feel free to add me.[/center]

runewings317:

Psttttt. I’ll design you a website if you gimme 15m rsgp <.< It will be sick as fuck and have auto donation

Add my msn - Kkjameskk@Hotmail.com

Read full topic

It could mean you have been staff on successful servers for along time without getting kicked out, orrrrr it could mean that you have been on multiple servers that were unsccessful and didn’t weren’t even there for more than 10 days…

13

For fun

Your msn
Tarb@live.co.uk

[/quote]

item.title: CombustionX Dev. Team [VPS|Paid Webhost|Domain][Webclient]
item.dc:creator: @CombustionXOwner CombustionXOwner
item.description:
@CombustionXOwner wrote:

[quote=“hawkgames, post:6, topic:400912”]Name: William
Age: 14
What are you applying for?: Server Helper
Experience in that specified field: I’m active, dedicated, I like using grammar on forums, I’m organized, was staff on servers with 10 - 20 players, I contribute what ever I can, I know some stuff like HTML but I only know little about it, I do use bbcode but not so often on these forums.
Supporting proof: I’m stuff on Blood-blitz.com and co-owner of Physxgaming.co.cc , use to be staff on a lot more servers but they shutted down, I have more information but I want to keep this simple.
How active will you be during the development?: I’m home mostly the entire day and I have a iDevice and Wireless connection so I can help moderate the forums.
Why do you want this job?: To help out, waste time, and have a good time and like most of the people I want power.
Your Msn or Contact Information: rune@physxgaming.co.cc[/quote]

Accepted - Look forward to seeing you on the server!

Read full topic
